properties.entry: SELECT sc_user.* , (select name from sc_security_groups where sc_security_groups.code = sc_user.group_code ) as GROUP_NAME FROM sc_user
INSERT INTO sc_security_groups ( NAME, CREATED, CODE, MEMO ) VALUES ( '{@#name#}', NOW(), '{@#code#}', '{@#memo#}' )
UPDATE sc_security_groups SET NAME = '{@#name#}' , MODIFIED = NOW() , CODE = '{@#code#}' , MEMO = '{@#memo#}' WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
SELECT * FROM sc_union_seller where 1=1 {@ and account_id = '#accountId#'}

SELECT COUNT(*) as C FROM sc_security_group_function s1,sc_user s2
WHERE s1.group_code = s2.group_code AND s2.login_id = '{@#loginId#}' AND s1.function_code = '{@#code#}'
SELECT * FROM sc_account_product_warning where 1=1 {@ and account_id = '#accountId#'}
SELECT s.* , concat(s.name,'[',s.id,']') AS TEXT FROM sc_security_function s where s.parent_id is null or s.parent_id = ''
